ProjectTitle: Adaptive Rehabilitative Gaming Systems for Powered Mobility Training in People with Complex Movement Disorders (ADA Games)
InitialFeedbackHistory:
08/07/2022
4. Documentation
Even if data cannot be reused in future through lack of consent), you still need to keep them for 10 years as evidence of the research and for validation. That also needs documentation, e.g. Readme files for each dataset, an index (datalist) of all interviews, the survey form (question list), script you might use for user testing.
label: good with suggestions
